Package util.event

Class EventManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.event.EventManager
  • public class EventManager
extends java.lang.Object
    EventManager accepts events from event-throwers and sends them to the appropriate listeners. EventManager is a singleton. use EventManager.getInstance() to get an instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      <T extends Event>
      void      		 addListener​(Listener l, java.lang.Class<T> eventClass)
      Registers l as listener for the given eventClass.
      static EventManager getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of EventManager.
      void removeListener​(Listener l)
      Unregisters l as listener for every eventType
      void throwEvent​(Event ev)
      Throws an event and thereby notifies all subscribed listeners.
